Original:
第一次嘗試水煙真的很有趣‼️‼️長長的管子，大口吸後，會吐出超級多的白煙，還有很多口味可以選擇，我選了芒果百香果，就真的有芒果百香果的味道，還帶有點涼涼薄荷香氣，來這裡跟朋友聊聊天，喝喝酒，再來個水煙，真的好療癒❤️❤️

他們家的餐點都滿好吃的😋很喜歡墨西哥辣椒臘腸披薩跟明太子雞肉奶油烏龍麵❤️❤️披薩皮很酥脆，起司味道非常濃郁，搭配墨西哥辣椒、臘腸，吃起來特別過癮‼️‼️明太子雞肉奶油烏龍麵的明太子奶油香氣特別濃厚，烏龍麵很Ｑ彈，雞腿肉很嫩，整體搭配的很完美❤️❤️

泡菜豬五花是厚實的三層肉，會提供生菜包肉，在夾泡菜一起吃，蒜味奶油牛小排，吃起來很嫩很香，松露薯條跟雞柳條就是喝酒一定要搭配的炸物‼️‼️

還有喝了他們的調酒，芭樂碧螺春茶，是伏特加、碧螺春綠茶、紅心芭樂組合而成，新鮮的紅心芭樂汁搭配伏特加跟碧螺春茶，滿滿紅心芭樂香氣，會讓人不知覺一直喝下去🤣🤣真的很推薦這間餐酒館，裝潢也滿有氣氛的，老闆還有養了超級多顏色的水母在水族箱裡面，超級療癒❤️❤️❤️
EN:
It's really interesting for the first time to try water tobacco‼️‼️The long tube, after the large mouth is sucking, it will spit out a lot of white smoke, and there are many flavors to choose from. I chose the mango passion fruit, which really has the taste of mango 100 -fragrant fruit, and it also has a cool mint aroma. Come here to chat with friends, drink and drink, and have a water cigarette, really good healing ❤️❤️

The food in their family is delicious. I like Mexican pepper sausage pizza and Ming Prince Chicken cream, oolong noodles ❤️❤️ Pizza is crispy, the cheese tastes very strong, with Mexican peppers and sausages, it is particularly enjoyable‼️‼️ Ming Prince Chicken Cream Cream Oolong Noodle Ming Prince's Cream has a strong aroma, the oolong noodles are very bombarded, the chicken legs are tender, and the overall matching is perfect ❤️❤️

Flower pork pork flowers are thick three -layer meat, which will provide lettuce and meat. Eat the kimchi together. The garlic creamy beef steak is very tender and fragrant. Ingenuity️‼️ ️

And drinking their bartending, Bale Bailuo Spring Tea, is a combination of vodka, Biluochun Green Tea, and Red Heart Berle. Fresh red -hearted guava juice with vodka and Biluochun tea, full of red -hearted guava aroma, will make people not make people not not I have been drinking it all the time. I really recommend this dining tavern. The decoration is full of atmosphere. The boss also has a super -color jellyfish in the aquarium, super healing ❤️❤️❤️

Original:
我在這裡經歷了最棒的經歷之一。雞尾酒很棒，食物很美味。工作人員很樂於助人，從頭到尾都非常友善。而且，身為素食主義者，我點餐變得很困難，令我驚訝的是，他們免費為我準備了專門為我做的素菜。這是他們完全出乎意料但令人稱讚的服務。
附註他們還給了我們一些免費鏡頭。
強烈推薦的地方。良好的音樂，優秀的員工，美味的食物，位置非常好。
EN:
I have experienced one of the best experiences here.Cocktails are great and the food is delicious.The staff is very happy, and it is very friendly from beginning to end.Moreover, as a vegetarian, I was very difficult to order. What surprised me was that they prepared vegetarian dishes for me for free.This is their completely unexpected but commendable service.
Note that they also gave us some free shots.
Place of strong recommendation.Good music, excellent employees, delicious food, very good location.
